thread.section_title: EVEN Hotel Times Square South - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Home away from home
thread.title_full: Home away from home - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MelanCollie
title: Home away from home
text: This hotel is new, fresh, light and welcoming. I was struggling with a cold when staying at the hotel and spent a lot of time in the room. The comfort and cleanliness of the room made me feel a lot better about being stuck indoors. The staff are without exception friendly and helpful and the location is really convenient.
